library(tidyverse)

header <- c( "chr", "start", "end", "count" )
df_kc <-  read_delim(
  "~/qb25-answers/week1/hg19-kc-count.bed", col_names=header )

plot_a <- ggplot(data = df_kc, aes(x=df_kc$start, y= df_kc$count))+
  geom_line()+
  labs(x= "chromsome", y="count")+
  facet_wrap(. ~ df_kc$chr,scales = "free")
print(plot_a)

ggsave("~/Desktop/exercise1.png")
